title: Certayne sermons, or homelies appoynted by the kynges Maiestie, to be declared and redde, by all persones, vicars, or curates, euery Sondaye in their churches, where they haue cure. Anno 1547.
author: Cranmer, Thomas, 1489-1556.
publicationDate: In the yere of our Lorde. M. D. XLVII [1547]]
publisher: The laste daie of Iulii, in the first yere of the reigne of our souereigne lord Kyng Edvvard the. VI: by Rychard Grafton printer to his moste royall Maiestie,
